page.title: 04A DAY IN THE LIFE
page.content: 6.30..{Get up,}get dressed and have a wash. 7.00..Take {dog}for a walk in the park. 7.30..{Breakfast,}then pack lunch boxes. 8.00..{Wash pots,}tidy around then change for work(District Nurse). 8.45..Get in to car and off{to work. 4.30..Get{home from work, cook tea then change. 5.30..Have tea then{wash tea pots. 6.30..Take{dog}for walk. 7.30..Play{badminton}with children. 8.30..Come in and{hear daughter read. 9.00..{Watch news. 9.30..Take{dog}for walk again. 9.45..Come back with dog,have {shower,}then into{bed}and{read.
